subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: Gete Wami and Robert Cheruiyot were each presented with a $500,000 check Sunday for winning the first two-year cycle of the World Marathon Majors.
snippet: Gete Wami and Robert Cheruiyot were each presented with a $500,000 check Sunday for winning the first two-year cycle of the World Marathon Majors.
